* * * * *

     The health foods are now regarded as of man's originating, and if any other productions are made, the thought arises. “Are they not infringing on our rights?” But the health foods are of God's originating, as a blessing to His people. They are not to be bound about and held under the control of the powers of Battle Creek as their special property. This business is God's property, and He will give enlightenment to other human agencies for its development. “Ye are not your own; for ye are 
52
bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body and in your spirit, which are God's.” 1 Corinthians 6:19, 20. We are not to follow the principle of wealthy worldly men,-of buying up and storing the whole supply of a food product, and then making people pay a high price for it; for thus the poor are made to suffer.
